Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL IN BRANSON!!! STAY AWAY!!!”
Reviews.Author: Brittany R
Reviews.Content: We stayed here Sept 2012. It was by far the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. I called the night before we came and the lady at the front desk answered the phone. She was so rude. She sounded a little slurish like I had just woke her up. Then when we got there to check in, she was EVEN MORE RUDE! Very impatient. Got to the room and the very first thing I see was a roach crawling on the wall by the picture frame above the bed! Then, there was a smaller one on the night stand! The bathrooms were alright but this was just unacceptable. The carpet and curtains stunk like mildew. We let it slide the first night because we got there about 2 am so we were tired. The next night, we went out and those little bugs were crawling ALL OVER the front door! Needless to say, we checked out that night after the show and just went home. I felt unclean after all of that and called our trip a night short. While talking to the "rude lady", we told her about all of the bugs in and out of the room. Never once offered to take care of it or even refund our money for that night. I will NEVER stay here again!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “ROACHES!!!”
Reviews.Author: catlvr35
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel July 28th and 29th, 2012. This wasnt our first stay which is what really shocked us at finding roaches in our room. When my husband showed the dead roaches, the manager said, "I dont know what happened. We havent had them before." The room had a strange odor when we first entered, and air freshener didnt alleviate the smell. Sorry, but we will not be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Yelled at by clerk when I called for information.”
Reviews.Author: geri r
Reviews.Content: I didn't even get to book a room here and would never, simply because of the way I was treated when I called for information. I called to ask if they were a pet friendly facility and the clerk yelled at me and said "I have answered you three times already". This was my first call. When I told him I had only called once he said the man that called before me wanted to know if they allowed pets. I told him that this was the first call he had received from this number (all the time he was trying to talk through me). I ended up yelling at him and telling him that people ask that question frequently because they want to take their pets with them. (and he is still talking over me) The price and amenities would never be right enough for me to rent from this facility!

Reviews.Title: “so-so hotel”
Reviews.Author: debbie m
Reviews.Content: stayed here and it was ok.the staff made us exchange towels for towels.had to ask 3 times for extra pillows because the desk clerk acted like she did not understand me.do not think this is a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value - Great Managers”
Reviews.Author: sthrasher
Reviews.Content: My wife and I and our 8 year old daughter were Christmas shopping in Branson, so we really just needed a place to sleep and store packages. The hotel needs updating, but the management is very friendly and hospitable. We didn't have any issues, but I feel like if we would have, they would have been resolved. Good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Management. Hotel needs update!”
Reviews.Author: specialteacherokc
Reviews.Content: We stayed in room 10. There was a sour smell when we entered. We went to Walmart to get an air freshener. The carpet had wet spots on it. Carpeting and drapes need to be replaced. It just made me feel that the room wasn't too clean. The phone had another hotels name on it. So, the furnishing were bought used. The management was helpful both times we inquired about something. They are very sweet people, as a matter of fact. Nice breakfast. This is a VERY low-frills hotel. Don't overpay for it.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the management”
Reviews.Author: ramblingtraveler_8
Reviews.Content: We stayed there in June of 08 and the management was very helpful. We were wanting get show tickets and they set us up with a ticket agency that got us discount tickets without the hassle of timeshare. The housekeeping staff was very friendly and always kept our room clean with fresh linens daily. We will definetely stay again on our next trip to branson.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: LouisianaBransonfan
Reviews.Content: have stayed there for 11 years every time i go to Branson .Its the only place that i want to stay when i go . Staff is always very helpfull at all times.

HotelInfo.Name: 76 Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2330 West Highway 76, Branson, MO 65616
